snippet: The Czech director Jaromil Jires’s phantasmagoric workout from 1970 is part avant-garde fairy tale, part hallucination; Gene Deitch’s cartoons for MGM also came from Czechoslovakia.
abstract: J Hoberman reviews DVD releases of Czech imports: Jaromil Jires 1970 film Valerie and Her Week of Wonders, and Tom and Jerry: The Gene Deitch Collection, series of Tom and Jerry cartoons Gene Deitch directed in 1960s.
lead_paragraph: The Czech director Jaromil Jires’s phantasmagoric workout from 1970 is part avant-garde fairy tale, part hallucination; Gene Deitch’s cartoons for MGM also came from Czechoslovakia.

headline.main: Tom, Jerry and ‘Valerie and Her Week of Wonders’: Cat, Mouse and Head Trip
headline.print_headline: From Czechoslovakia, a Cat, a Mouse and a Head Trip

keywords.name: creative_works
